::Ramulus::

Ramulus enters the storage compartments, walking toward a comp. He sits down 
at the chair, browsing through a list of equipment. Ramulus looks back at 
Brix after a few seconds, a sad look in his eyes.

"I'm sorry. No blank protoforms available," he says, "We could set up a 
search for a pod..."
